         double angle,
         double rotation)
        Drives using given values
        Parameters:
        magnitude - speed of the robot
        angle - direction of the robot
        rotation - rate of rotation

      • setCameraMode

        public void setCameraMode(boolean mode)
        Sets the PID mode to either camera or joystick
        Parameters:
        mode - Whether or not to use camera pid mode (true), if false, uses joystick PID

      • getCameraMode

        public boolean getCameraMode()
